name: List Files
info:
# List files

Will list files in a directory.

Path can be set in `msg.payload` or by setting the `DIRECTORY` environment variable.

Extensions can be filtered by settings the `EXTENSIONS` environment variable to an Array of extensions.

Selon l’article L335-3 du code de la propriété intellectuelle, constitue « un délit de contrefaçon la violation de l’un des droits de l’auteur d’un logiciel définis à l’article L122-6 ».
Toute atteinte aux droits de l’auteur de logiciel peut donc être qualifiée de contrefaçon.
Ce logiciel est la propriété de Jean-Luc Martinelli. Il est soumis à la loi sur la propriété intellectuelle et les droits d'auteurs.
Il a été conçu pour gérer des onduleurs du type Superwatt ou Voltronic ou assimilés
Seul l'auteur JLM à la droit de modifier tout ou partie de ce logiciel
Ne pas transmettre, copier ou modifier ce logiciel sans l'acceptation écrite de son auteur
Pour le logo, il faut lire le commentaire ci-dessous
info:
Il faut modifier le settings.js pour pointer là où se trouve l'image

**httpStatic: '/home/pi/Pictures/',**

name: Logo / Clock
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
//    var version = global.get("Version");
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        // add Text
        var div4 = $('<div/>');
        var t = document.createTextNode("©JLM&ADC 2023");
        
        div4.append(t);
        div4[0].style.margin = '10px';
        div4[0].style.size = '10';
        
        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();

        //logo.src = '/logo-onduleur.png'
        logo.src = '/logo-smartphoton.svg'

        logo.height = 70;
        div1[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        var a = $("<a/>"); //create an anchor / hyperlink
        a.attr("href", "https://smartphoton.fr"); //set HREF to dashboard homepage
        a.append(logo); //add logo to anchor
        div1.append(a); //add anchor to div1

        //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '5px';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString());
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
            toolbar.append(div2);
            toolbar.append(div4);
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

name: Dashboard stylesheet
format:
<style>

/*
Its reasonable to declare the colors as CSS variables
so they can be easily called by name where needed.

You can see that in many places the variables are not used. Change it!
*/

:root {
  --color-green-primary: rgb(51, 204, 51);
  --color-green-secondary: rgb(26, 101, 26);
  --color-red-primary: rgb(255, 0, 0);
  --color-red-secondary: rgba(153,0,0,1);
  --color-gray-primary:rgba(40,40,40,1);
  --color-gray-secondary:rgba(65,65,65,1);
  --color-text-primary: rgb(0, 0, 0);
  --color-widget-border: rgb(84, 78, 78);
}

/*
All CSS adjustments are commented out.
Turn rules on one by one and see the changes.
Don't use too many elements cos it wil be confusing
Start with simple elements like text, slider or button

Many of elements like buttons have states, 
those rules must be found and adjusted also.
*/

/*
.masonry-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height:100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    background: rgb(255,0,0);
    background: linear-gradient(180deg,  var(--color-gray-primary) 0%, var(--color-gray-secondary) 100%);
}
*/

/*
.nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 4px 0px #000000bb;
    border-radius: 10px;
}
*/


.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
    background-color: #33333300;
    color:var(--color-text-primary);
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px 0px #00000080;
}



body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
    background-color: #33333300;
    color: var(--color-text-primary);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #00000045;
    font-size:1em;
    box-shadow: 0 -1px 5px 1px #00000045;
    border-radius: 4px;
    border: 1px solid var(--color-widget-border);
}



.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    color: var(--color-text-primary);
}




.md-button {
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    cursor: pointer;
    min-height: 36px;
    min-width: 88px;
    line-height: 36px;
    vertical-align: middle;
    align-items: center;
    text-align: center;
/*    border-radius: 4px; */
    box-sizing: border-box;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    user-select: none;
    outline: none;
    border: 0;
    padding: 0 6px;
    margin: 6px 8px;
    background: transparent;
    color:var(--color-text-primary);
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-style: inherit;
    font-variant: inherit;
    font-family: inherit;
    text-decoration: none;
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: box-shadow .4s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1),background-color .4s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);
}




.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
    background-color: #88888800;
    color:var(--color-text-primary);
}



.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
    background-color: #88888855;
}



/*
md-slider .md-thumb {
    z-index: 1;
    position: absolute;
    left: -10px;
    top: 14px;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    border-radius: 20px;
    -webkit-transform: scale(.7);
    transform: scale(.7);
    transition: all .4s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);
    box-shadow: 0 0 6px #00000070;
}

*/

/*
Advanced stuff - dynamic change of card CSS

Classes here can be used to make colored stripe at the top of card
Usage is not in here, but they are added to md-card when needed within another template

.carderr {
    background: rgb(255,0,0);
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--color-red-primary) 0px, var(--color-red-secondary) 3px, rgba(80,80,80,1) 4px, rgba(45,45,45,1) 100%);
}
.cardok {
    background: rgb(39,255,0);
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, var(--color-green-primary) 0px, var(--color-green-secondary) 3px, rgba(70,70,70,1) 4px, rgba(40,40,40,1) 100%);
}
*/

</style>

func: return msg;

name: **** Lisez moi pour savoir comment faire !!!!   ****
info:
Pour définir les buffers utilisés pour envoyer des questions / ordres à l'onduleur il faut:

Par exemple: PBCV25.5
1) Le convertir en décimal avec:   https://onlinestringtools.com/convert-string-to-decimal
2) Mettre ces valeurs dans le buffer avec les "," entre chaques valeurs
3) Convertir le string en hexa avec:   http://string-functions.com/string-hex.aspx
4) Prendre le résultat et utiliser le calculateur CRC https://crccalc.com/ 
5) Le CRC se trouve à coté de la ligne nommée CRC-16/XMODEM ex: 0xA6E7 le CRC est A6 et E7
6) Prendre le A6 et le convertir en Hexa https://www.rapidtables.com/convert/number/hex-to-decimal.html
7) Le poser à la suite des valeurs décimales, mettre une virgule
8) Prendre le E7 et le convertir en Hexa https://www.rapidtables.com/convert/number/hex-to-decimal.html
9) Le poser à la suite des valeurs décimales juste avant le ]

name: commande <Stat n>
array_pylontech_LC
Set Nbre_bat_Pylontech
commande <Pwr>
Créer array_pylontech_Pwr
Row to Array
func:
var a = msg.payload
var array = []
array[0] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(0, 6)), "BattID", null, null)
array[1] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(6, 7)) / 1000, "Volt", "V", "voltage", array[0][0])
array[2] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(13, 7)) / 1000, "Curr", "A", "current", array[0][0])
array[3] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(20, 7)) / 1000, "Tempr", "°C", "temperature", array[0][0])
array[4] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(27, 7)) / 1000, "Tlow", "°C", "temperature", array[0][0])
array[5] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(34, 7)) / 1000, "Thigh", "°C", "temperature", array[0][0])
array[6] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(41, 7)) / 1000, "Vlow", "V", "voltage", array[0][0])
array[7] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(48, 7)) / 1000, "Vhigh", "V", "voltage", array[0][0])
array[8] = new Array(a.substr(55, 9).trim(), "BaseSt", null, null, array[0][0])
array[9] = new Array(a.substr(64, 9).trim(), "VoltSt", null, null, array[0][0])
array[10] = new Array(a.substr(73, 9).trim(), "CurrSt", null, null, array[0][0])
array[11] = new Array(a.substr(82, 9).trim(), "TempSt", null, null, array[0][0])
array[12] = new Array(parseInt(a.toString().substr(91, 9)), "SOC", "%", "battery", array[0][0])

if (array[8][0] !== "Absent" && array[8][0] != "" && array[8][0] != "Base.St") {
    msg.payload = array
    return msg;
}

name: Timestamp
Formatage state
Prepare chart Conso in Wh
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Consommation Journalière", payload: msg.payload.LoadDailyEnergy, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Prepare chart Achat in Wh
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Achat Journalier", payload: msg.payload.DailyEnergyTakenFromTheGrid, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Prepare chart SOC in Wh
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "SOC in Wh", payload: msg.payload.SoCWh, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Format infos
Formatage
func:
msg.result = {};
msg.result.Timestamp = Date.now();
msg.result.OperatingStatus = msg.payload[0]; // 0x0200
msg.result.BatteryChargeDischargePower = ((msg.payload[13] << 16) >> 16) * 10.0; // 0x020D
msg.result.BatteryVoltage = msg.payload[14] / 10.0; // 0x020E
msg.result.SoC = ((msg.payload[16] << 16) >> 16); // 0x0210
msg.result.SoCWh = msg.result.SoC * 168.0;
msg.result.BatteryTemperature = ((msg.payload[17] << 16) >> 16); //0x0211
msg.result.GridPower = ((msg.payload[18] << 16) >> 16) * 10.0; //0x0212
msg.result.LoadPower = msg.payload[19] * 10.0; //0x0213
msg.result.EnergyStoragePowerInverter = ((msg.payload[20] << 16) >> 16) * 10.0; //0x0214
msg.result.PVPowerGeneration = (msg.payload[21]) * 10.0; //0x0215
msg.result.EPSOutputVoltage = (msg.payload[22]) / 10.0; //0x0216
msg.result.EPSPowerOutput = (msg.payload[23]) * 10.0; //0x0217
msg.result.DailyEnergy = (msg.payload[24]) * 10.0; //0x0218
msg.result.DailyEnergyInjectedIntoTheGrid = (msg.payload[25]) * 10.0; //0x0219
msg.result.DailyEnergyTakenFromTheGrid = (msg.payload[26]) * 10.0; //0x021A
msg.result.LoadDailyEnergy = (msg.payload[27]) * 10.0; //0x021B
msg.result.TotalEnergyHigh = (msg.payload[28]); //0x021C
msg.result.TotalEnergyLow = (msg.payload[29]); //0x021D
msg.result.BatteryCycleTimes = (msg.payload[44]); //0x022C
msg.result.BatteryPower = (msg.payload[55]); //0x0237
msg.result.InnerTemperature = (msg.payload[56]); //0x0238

msg.payload = msg.result;
return msg;

name: Prepare chart PV in Wh
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Génération PV Journalière", payload: msg.payload.DailyEnergy, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Prepare chart Conso in W
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Consommation", payload: msg.payload.LoadPower, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Prepare chart Achat in W
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Injection/prélèvement réseau", payload: msg.payload.GridPower, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Prepare chart bat (dé)charge in W
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Charge/décharge batterie", payload: msg.payload.BatteryChargeDischargePower, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Prepare chart PV in W
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Génération PV", payload: msg.payload.PVPowerGeneration, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

name: Insert parameters
func:
msg.params = { $timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp, $json_data: JSON.stringify(msg.payload)};
return msg;

Prepare Instant chart
Prepare chart Injection Réseau in Wh
func:
let msg1 = { topic: "Injection Journalière", payload: msg.payload.DailyEnergyInjectedIntoTheGrid, timestamp: msg.payload.Timestamp};
return msg1;

format:
<style>
  .filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}
  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>

func: rbei

name: Voir ci-dedans tous les types d'évenenments ainsi que leur explication
info:
Client Events

Use home_assistant_client as the event type to receive events from the Websocket client.

Events sent from the client:

    connecting - when trying to connect to HA
    connected - after the authorization has been accepted
    disconnected - when the socket stops attempting to connect or disconnected after having been connected
    error - when a disconnect happens of the WebSocket with an error
    states_loaded - the first time all states are loaded from HA
    services_loaded - the first time all services are loaded from HA
    running - when HA is in a running state and states have been loaded
